Attacks.Name: Drill Peck
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Fearow gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Fury Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, Fearow may make an additional Fury Attack without paying the cost. The additional attack must target the original character.

Attacks.Name: Sky Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target is Pushed S before damage is dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Keen Eye
Superpowers.Effect: Fearow may reroll one die in its attack rolls when attacking a character with the Stealth ability.

Superpowers.Name: Agility
Superpowers.Effect: Fearow may advance S after being targeted by an enemy attack. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Brave Bird
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Fearow suffers 1 damage and the target character is pushed S.

Superpowers.Name: Reckless
Superpowers.Effect: Fearow may add 1 die to its attack rolls when performing physical attacks, but it suffers 1 damage after the attack is resolved.
